body: Ok, I can't stand this. The lag is INSANE. I can't rush, I can't even kill people without dieing by the lag. I just wish that somebody would do SOMETHING about it ._.

title: THE LAG!

replies.body: +1, sky bridging takes ages :/
replies.body_tagged: +1, sky bridging takes ages :/

replies.body:
yeah.. the best thing to do would be to give the server more gb but that may not be an option.

i would get optifine and set everything to as fast as you can, that's what i do pretty much and it usually works great unless there's a ton of lag and even then it only lags a bit for me.

replies.body:
+1.
This is why I can't record Nebula anymore; I haven't made a Nebula video in weeks. I've been wanting to make a post about this as well, I'm glad you finally brought it up.

Please do something to fix this, I understand that it may take a while, but it is a really big reason why I see people leaving.

Just today, I've seen players saying things such as:
"OMG the lagg i quit."
"What is with all this block lagg??"

Even for me, whenever I try bridging over the rainbow in "Castle Adventure", I always fall and die because of the block lagg.
Also, whenever I get to the monument, my bridge glitches and I fall into the void.

Staircase lagg is extremely annoying as well.
